title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the limits and constant

2 points are earned for the integrand

Voulme=π ∫ 0 4 ((2− x 2 ) 2 − (2− x)  ) 2 )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5281@
